title: Bitten
description: **Steamy 18+** Paranormal Romance Serial Novel | 18,000 Words | Part 2 of 5There’s only one substance on earth that can create a new vampire–the blood of a Chalice, a rare individual with magic in her veins. Atlanta’s human-vampire Civility Laws demand that if a Chalice is found, she must be destroyed. Dark, dangerous vampire Teijon Reyes was a memory haunting Dessa’s nightmares and her fantasies. She would have been happy to leave him in the deepest recesses of her mind but fate has other plans. No matter how Dessa yearns for the protective heat of the sun, blood-born secrets now rule the night.
author: E.R. Davis
